Displays the reason why the table is not supported by SQL Apply. If the structure of the table is unsupported (not just the datatype of some columns), then this view displays all columns in the table, with one of the following values displayed for each column in the table:

  • IOT with Overflow

  • IOT with LOB

  • Mapping table for physical rowid of IOT

  • IOT with row movement

  • Table Compression

  • Object Table

  • AQ queue table

  • Unsupported Virtual Column

  • Encrypted Column

If the structure of the table is supported but certain columns in the table have unsupported datatypes, the ATTRIBUTE column will be NULL.
